description: A renowned scholar from the Akademiya, Faruzan is an Anemo support who specializes in buffing Anemo DMG and debuffing enemy Anemo RES.
info: Faruzan is a top-tier Anemo support for characters like Wanderer, Xiao, and Heizou. Build her for Energy Recharge and Anemo DMG Bonus to maximize her buffs and debuffs.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Parthian Shot
skills.desc: Performs up to 4 consecutive shots with a bow.
skills.details_html:
Normal Attack
Performs up to 4 consecutive shots with a bow.
Charged Attack
Performs a more precise Aimed Shot with increased DMG. A fully charged shot deals Anemo DMG.
Plunging Attack
Fires off a shower of arrows in mid-air before falling and striking the ground, dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Wind Realm of Nasamjnin
skills.desc: Faruzan deploys a polyhedron that deals AoE Anemo DMG and grants the Pressurized Collapse effect, pulling in enemies and reducing their Anemo RES.
skills.details_html:
Wind Realm of Nasamjnin
Deploys a polyhedron that deals AoE Anemo DMG and grants the Pressurized Collapse effect, pulling in enemies and reducing their Anemo RES.

skills.name: The Wind's Secret Ways
skills.desc: Faruzan creates a Dazzling Polyhedron that moves in a triangular path, dealing AoE Anemo DMG and granting the Prayerful Wind's Benefit to all nearby party members, increasing their Anemo DMG and reducing enemy Anemo RES.
skills.details_html:
The Wind's Secret Ways
Creates a Dazzling Polyhedron that moves in a triangular path, dealing AoE Anemo DMG and granting the Prayerful Wind's Benefit to all nearby party members, increasing their Anemo DMG and reducing enemy Anemo RES.

passive_talents.name: Impetuous Flow
passive_talents.desc: When Faruzan is in the party, the cost of charged attacks is reduced by 20%.

passive_talents.name: Lost Wisdom of the Seven Caverns
passive_talents.desc: Characters affected by Prayerful Wind's Benefit gain 40% increased Anemo DMG Bonus.

passive_talents.name: Tomes Light the Path
passive_talents.desc: When Faruzan crafts Weapon Ascension Materials, she has a 10% chance to receive double the product.

constellations.name: Truth by Any Means
constellations.desc: Faruzan can fire 1 additional Hurricane Arrow per charged attack.

constellations.name: Overzealous Intellect
constellations.desc: The duration of Prayerful Wind's Benefit is increased by 6s.

constellations.name: Spirit-Orchard Stroll
constellations.desc: Increases the level of The Wind's Secret Ways by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Divine Comprehension
constellations.desc: When characters affected by Prayerful Wind's Benefit trigger a Swirl reaction, they restore 2 Energy. Can occur once every 2s.

constellations.name: Wonderland of Rumination
constellations.desc: Increases the level of Wind Realm of Nasamjnin by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: The Wondrous Path of Truth
constellations.desc: Characters affected by Prayerful Wind's Benefit gain 40% increased CRIT DMG.
